channel.title: MiR Community Highlights on MiR Community
channel.description: Recent content in MiR Community Highlights on MiR Community

item.title: MiR Community Highlight: Andy Murtha
item.description: Mir Community Highlights offer a chance to meet MiR Community members and learn more about their professional journeys, experiences with R, and personal pursuits. For this community highlight, please meet…. ✨ Andy Murtha What is your current role? Tell us about yourself! What are the most important skills in your current position? How did you develop these skills? What are some difficulties you’ve faced in your career?

item.title: MiR Community Highlight: Yanina Noemí Bellini Saibene
item.description: Mir Community Highlights offer a chance to meet MiR Community members and learn more about their professional journeys, experiences with R, and personal pursuits. For this community highlight, please meet…. ✨ Yanina Noemí Bellini Saibene (she/her) What is your current role? I have a lot of hats but the job that pays the bills is as Research at National Institute of Agricultural Technology (INTA) coordinating the Agroecosystem Modeling Network and professor at Universidad Nacional Guillermo Brown (UNAB).
